name: SELECT_LTE
desc: Inserts the result of selecting the less than equal to specified value taken from stack among number of reports by a logic and mode into the stack

operand.name: Logic
operand.desc: select lte logic: every or any logic

operand.name: Mode
operand.desc: select lte mode: min, max or first

parameters.name: Referrence Timestamp
parameters.desc: The timestamp to check the tier reports against
